suggestions.original: To improve the line combinations in the artwork, consider the following suggestions: 1. Enhance the cohesion between the figures and the background by using consistent line thickness and style. This will help integrate the elements more seamlessly. 2. Refine the outlines of the figures to make them more distinct and clear, which will improve the overall definition and readability of the characters. 3. Pay attention to the interaction between the lines of the figures and the background elements, such as the clouds and sun, to ensure they complement each other rather than compete for attention. 4. Use lines to add more details and textures to the background elements, like the clouds and flowers, to create a more dynamic and engaging scene. 5. Experiment with varying line weights to create depth and emphasis on certain parts of the artwork, guiding the viewer's eye through the composition effectively.
